6 import pathlib

13 def get_file_list(file_path, file_ext):
14  p_path = pathlib.Path(file_path)
15  files = p_path.glob(file_ext)
16  file_names = [p.absolute() for p in files if p.is_file()]
17  return file_names

22 def grant_execute_permission(filePath):
23  folderPath = pathlib.Path(filePath).parent
24  list = get_file_list(folderPath, '*.[Pp][Yy]')
25 
26  for i, f in enumerate(list):
27  if i==0:
28  print("change file permission to [rwx rwx r-x]")
29  print(" [folder path] {0}".format(list[0].parent))
30  pathlib.Path(f).chmod(0b111111101)
31  print(" {0} : {1}".format(i,f.name))
